CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains Warm-Up to MOT then leaves the room
CHI turns around and looks in the direction of the door
MOT looks at CHI then across the room
CHI turns from the door then looks down . CHI points
MOT looks at CHI then looks away from CHI
CHI walks over to the chair then bends down to pick up something
<aft> CHI turns and looks at MOT then looks down at the toy in her hand
MOT leans toward CHI briefly then leans back
CHI looks around the room then looks up at something
CHI points up then looks at MOT
CHI turns and points to something different
MOT looks at CHI then looks at the camera
MOT takes off her glasses then puts them in her bag
CHI looks down then walks toward MOT . <aft> CHI bends down to touch the jack+in+the+box
MOT places her bag and CHI's sweater on the chair by the door
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box closer to herself
CHI moves closer to MOT while looking down
CHI's back is to the camera
MOT picks up CHI and moves her to the other side of the jack+in+the+box
CHI sits on the floor in front of MOT looking down . CHI holds a toy in one hand
MOT looks down . <aft> MOT glances up at CHI
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box around then resumes turning the crank
MOT looks at CHI as she turns the crank
CHI looks up at MOT briefly then down at the floor
CHI touches the truck on the floor next to her . CHI looks at the clown
MOT touches the clown then looks at CHI
MOT hits the clown so it sways back and forth
CHI reaches over and touches the clown
MOT stuffs the clown into the box
CHI looks down then reaches for the lid
<aft> CHI tries to open the jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI looks away from the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI looks at the clown
CHI looks at the clown . CHI reaches for the clown
MOT leans back and looks at CHI
CHI pulls the clown closer to herself then closes the lid squishing the clown
<aft> MOT pushes the clown into the box then snaps the lid shut . <aft> MOT turns the crank

MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI looks at and touches the clown
MOT leans back looking at the clown
<aft> CHI looks at the toy in her hand then at the clown again . <aft> CHI looks across the room briefly
MOT looks over her shoulder at something under the table
MOT leans forward pointing to the bears on the chair cushion
CHI looks at the chair then looks down at the floor
CHI turns around and reaches for something on the floor behind her
MOT reaches over CHI for the book
CHI looks down while holding a toy in one hand
CHI reaches down and points at the page
CHI looks at toy in her hand then at the book again
MOT looks over at the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at MOT then across the room toward the mirror
CHI turns her back at MOT and looks over her shoulder at something

MOT looks at CHI then at the book
CHI looks at the toy in her hand then down at the book
MOT looks down as she points
CHI reaches down and points at something in the book
CHI points at something in the book
CHI puts the toy in her hand into her mouth

<aft> CHI puts the toy in her mouth
MOT pulls the toy out of CHI's mouth
MOT takes the duck from CHI and moves it back and forth as she squeezes it in front of CHI's face
CHI reaches for the duck . <aft> CHI looks down then up toward the camera
<bef> MOT held the duck for CHI then it drops to the floor . MOT refers to the camera
CHI reaches down for the toy duck
CHI picks up the duck in one hand
MOT glances at CHI then looks down
MOT points then glances at CHI
CHI looks across the room then crawls toward another toy
CHI sits down on the book while reaching for the clown
MOT lifts CHI off of the book
MOT slides the book out from underneath CHI
MOT leans over and reaches for the ball
MOT sits down in front of CHI looking down at the ball in her hands
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI looks in the direction of MOT
<bef> MOT tosses the ball on the floor in front of CHI . MOT picks up the ball
CHI remains seated in front of MOT looking down
MOT puts the ball down then stuffs the clown into its box . <aft> MOT snaps the lid shut

<aft> MOT pulls the jack+in+the+box closer to CHI
MOT looks down then over her shoulder
CHI picks up the football the tosses it across the room

MOT looks down at CHI then up at the wall
CHI turns and sits down facing MOT . CHI looks up

CHI throws the ball under the table
CHI looks across the room under the table
MOT looks across the room where CHI threw the ball
<aft> MOT snaps the lid shut on the jack+in+the+box

CHI looks around on the floor

MOT moves the clown back a bit so CHI can have a better look
CHI looks at clown while pointing at the clown
CHI reaches out and points at the clown
INV explains small scale activity then leaves the room
INV re-enters the room and explains Forbidden Object to MOT
INV places the forbidden object on the table in front of CHI

MOT looks at then reaches for the base of the object

CHI looks down at the toy on the table

CHI plays with the slinky toy
MOT looks at CHI then at the object
CHI looks at object then down at the slinky in her hands
MOT looks in direction of INV and nods her head yes
CHI looks up in the direction of INV briefly
CHI plays with the slinky as MOT lists the following items

the slinky falls off of the table

MOT is visible from the waist down
CHI picks up the ball then tosses it across the room

CHI turns around and faces MOT
<aft> CHI tosses the ball on the floor

MOT is mostly out of camera range

MOT refers to picture on the wall out of camera range
MOT gestures across the room with the ball then looks up
CHI walks across the room while looking up and pointing at something
MOT looks up and refers to something out of camera range
CHI turns around and looks at MOT
<aft> MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI picks up the ball and throws it
<aft> CHI runs across the room past MOT

MOT holds the ball out in front of CHI
CHI takes the ball then tosses it across the room
CHI bends down and picks up the ball
CHI walks toward the desk while pointing up
CHI turns and looks in MOT's direction
MOT stands up and walks toeward CHI
CHI stands next to MOT looking up
MOT is visible from the waist down as she finds a new activity
MOT kneels down on the floor across from CHI
MOT holds up the towel to cover her face
MOT holds the towel out in front of CHI
CHI lays the towel on the floor
CHI fidgets with the towel on the floor
<bef> MOT picks up the towel then hides behind it
CHI looks at MOT then reaches for the towel
MOT looks down holding the towel on her lap
CHI bends down and reaches for the towel
<aft> CHI holds the towel then discards it on the floor
CHI turns away from MOT and points to something out of camera view
CHI turns around and looks at MOT
MOT looks at the camera as it moves
CHI looks at camera then at MOT
MOT opens her mouth wide in mock surprise in response to the camera movement
CHI turns and walks away from MOT toward the door . CHI looks up
CHI turns around and looks at MOT then looks all around the room
CHI looks up and points to something out of camera view
MOT points as she looks up
CHI takes a few steps toward the door as she points up at something
CHI turns and looks at MOT . <aft> CHI turns and looks up
MOT points up at a picture on the wall
MOT looks at CHI then holds out the towel
MOT looks at CHI while holding up the towel
CHI reaches out for the towel then hugs it
MOT lets go of the towel
CHI turns and walks away from MOT while hugging the towel
CHI turns in the direction of MOT
MOT drapes the towel over CHI's head
CHI stands by MOT with the towel draped over her
CHI removes the towel then looks at MOT
CHI holds the towel around her neck
CHI drops the towel to the floor
CHI turns and walks away from MOT while pointing at something
CHI turns around and looks at MOT while standing next to the desk
MOT is in partial view of camera
MOT holds the towel out toward CHI
CHI runs over to MOT and into the towel
MOT drapes the towel over CHI's head
CHI stands next to MOT with the towel over her head
CHI turns away from MOT then walks toward the door
CHI shakes the towel free from her arms
CHI briefly stumbles over the discarded towel
<aft> CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI walks past MOT then leans on the chair by the table
MOT moves stuff around on the desk and is visible from the waist down
CHI stands behind MOT looking up
MOT places paper on the table
CHI stumbles as she turns around
MOT kneels on the floor beside CHI
CHI looks down . CHI reaches for the paper
MOT removes CHI's hand from the paper
MOT places one crayon on the paper then moves the paper closer to CHI
CHI steps back a couple of steps as she looks at the paper

CHI takes hold of the crayon then begins to put it up to her mouth
MOT pulls the crayon out of CHI's mouth

MOT lets go of CHI's hand
MOT looks down over CHI's shoulder

CHI taps the crayon on the paper
CHI looks across the table at something
MOT picks up another crayon and holds it up

MOT puts the crayon in CHI's hand and moves the other crayon out of the way

CHI lets MOT manipulate her hand with the crayon

CHI takes the crayon then taps the crayon on the paper

CHI lets go of the crayon

end of PCI- Crayons and Paper
